alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 7:09AM CDT until March 26 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR AUTAUGA...NORTHEASTERN LOWNDES AND NORTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 709 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Burnsville, or near Valley Grande, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Prattville, Millbrook, Deatsville, Autaugaville, Booth, Mulberry, Vida Junction, Gardner Island, Burnsville, Autauga County Airport, Valley Creek Junction and Dawson Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for central, south central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
